About1.content: Schumy Vanna Kaviyangal is run by a group of anonymous individuals who come out publicly only with creepy guy Fawkes masks. We are known for our unapologetic and undemanding straightforward approach in spreading Dravidian ideology. Our key goal is to enlighten young adults and the common crowd with the right political knowledge. We are also known for our movie discussions because all our key team members have ample experience in films and its industry for years. We have conducted various film based research over the years and expressed them over our podcast. We plan to continue entertaining the crowd with our political and social commentary while we educate them at the same time through history, economics ,science & socio politics by using humour as an appetizer.

About4.content: Hey there, I'm Haashiraamaa Senju, the brain behind SVK Podcast! üéôÔ∏è I kicked off this rollercoaster of a show to chat about everything under the sun ‚Äì politics, movies, sports, science, and more! No filters, just pure fun and honest thoughts. But guess what? It's not a one-person show. I've got an epic squad of co-hosts, editors, researchers, and all-around cool peeps who help bring SVK to life. Together, we're all about shaking things up and speaking our minds!
